Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Relates to restricting the packaging and sale of confectionery and candy products
Summary: Prohibits the packaging and sale of confectionery and candy products which are facsimiles of tobacco products.
LawCode: Add ยง396-ff, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to restricting the packaging and sale of confectionery and candy products
